text: Approved fence layout and material specifications reviewed
Property lines, easements, and clearances verified and staked
Line, terminal, corner, and gate post locations marked and spacing confirmed
Post hole depth and diameter meet spec and frost depth requirements
Concrete footing depth and alignment confirmed; top sloped for drainage
Posts installed plumb, square, and at consistent height
Fence fabric or panels tensioned and fastened securely to rails/posts
Horizontal rails and supports aligned and installed without sag
Fence height and gap from ground meet specifications
Gate frames aligned and swing direction checked
Hinges, stops, and latches installed and function properly
Locking or security hardware tested and documented
Entire fence line inspected for straightness, continuity, and damage
Excavated soil removed or graded; postholes flush with finish grade
All excess material and debris removed from site

id: • City of Edmonton/Calgary Land Use Bylaws, Accessibility & Security Guidelines
